PrivacyPolicyScreen.yourPrivacyIsImportant:
Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy outlines the types of information we collect,
how we use it, and the steps we take to protect your data. By using our services, you agree to the
collection and use of information as described in this policy.
PrivacyPolicyScreen.informationCollection:
1. Information Collection: We collect information when you use our services, such as personal details,
usage data, and device information.
PrivacyPolicyScreen.dataUsage: 2. Data Usage: The information we collect is used to enhance your experience and communicate with you.
PrivacyPolicyScreen.dataProtection:
3. Data Protection: We employ security measures to protect your data. However, no method of transmission
over the Internet is 100% secure.
PrivacyPolicyScreen.yourRights: 4. Your Rights: You have the right to access, modify, or delete your personal information at any time.
PrivacyPolicyScreen.youHaveSuccessfullyAccepted: You've successfully accepted our Privacy Policy.

TermsAndServicesScreen.welcomeToTerms:
Welcome to our Terms and Services. By using our services, you agree to comply with and be bound by
the following terms. Please review them carefully.
TermsAndServicesScreen.acceptance: 1. Acceptance: Your use of our services constitutes your agreement to these terms.
TermsAndServicesScreen.useOfServices: 2. Use of Services: You agree to use our services responsibly and in compliance with applicable laws.
TermsAndServicesScreen.limitationsOfLiability: 3. Limitations of Liability: We are not liable for any damages arising from the use of our services.
TermsAndServicesScreen.modifications:
4. Modifications: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Continued use of services
implies acceptance of any updates.
TermsAndServicesScreen.youHaveSuccessfullyAcceptedTerms: You've successfully accepted our Terms and Services.
